title: Rep. Andy Levin, Jobs, Manufacturing, China
itunes:title: Rep. Andy Levin, Jobs, Manufacturing, China
description:
Congressman Andy Levin, a Democrat representing Michigan's 9th congressional district discusses jobs recovery, domestic manufacturing, diversifying supply chains, and China. He spoke with Bloomberg Chief Washington Correspondent Kevin Cirilli and Bloomberg politics contributor Jeanne Sheehan Zaino.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
